  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Default constructor for GameController. This creates instances of the other necessary classes that are needed to run the game.

  • Method Details

    • getGameLength

      public int getGameLength()

    • setGameLength

      public void setGameLength(int gameLength)

    • getCurrentDay

      public int getCurrentDay()

    • increaseCurrentDay

      public void increaseCurrentDay()
      Increments the current day by 1. This method is used to progress to the next day easily.

    • getDifficulty

      public int getDifficulty()

    • setDifficulty

      public void setDifficulty(int difficulty)

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns the main player instance being used.
      Returns:
      Player this returns the player instance that is being used by the game so other classes can access it easily.

    • getShop

      public Shop getShop()
      Returns the main shop instance being used.
      Returns:
      Shop this returns the shop instance that is being used by the game so other classes can access it easily.

    • getBattleController

      public BattleController getBattleController()

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • run

      public void run()
      This is the method that is called by the main method to start the game sequence. This launches the Launch Screen so that the initial values can be gathered from the player.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This is called to correctly shutdown the game and the Java Runtime.

    • getStartingMonsters

      public ArrayList<Monster> getStartingMonsters()
      Generates a list of 3 random monsters for the start of the game for the player to choose.
      Returns:
      startingMonsters an ArrayList that contains 3 monsters for the player to select from.

    • setupValues

      public void setupValues(String name, int length, int difficulty, Monster startingMonster)
      Sets all the initial values that are gathered by the set up screen
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      length - the total length of the game in days
      difficulty - the difficulty of the game (0 = easy, 1 = hard)
      startingMonster - the monster that starts on the players team

    • nightReset

      public void nightReset()
      Resets everything that needs to be reset at the end of the day when the player sleeps. Does the following items:
      • Resets the monsters temporarily increased stats from potions and food.
      • Resets all the items and monsters on sale in the shop.
      • Checks that the player hasn't met a game ending condition (no monsters and not enough gold, or they slept on the final day)
      • Ends the game if a game ending condition is met.
